summary.para: Provides a pointer to a specified object's interface. The object and interface are specified by index and interface ID.

param.name: riid
param.para: Reference to the desired interface ID.

param.name: ppv
param.para: Receives the interface pointer requested in riid.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a count of the objects in the collection.

param.name: pcObjects
param.para: The number of objects in the collection.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that enable clients to access items in a collection of objects that support .

remarks.para: Clients do not need to implement this interface.
Use this interface to access generic objects in an array.
